message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in buying it, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
